content: magnificent marge with thanks this pattern is dedicated to my wonderful aunty marge every element in this design is inspired by her words can not express how much you are missed now that you are gone you absolutely rocked my world aunty marge <3 i can not thank my testers enough not only did they test this series of patterns but they guided and taught me along the way special thanks to sam bennett for once again being my editor every one of these special ladies helped pull this dedication together for me i am forever grateful thank you copyright c crochet wench 2020 copyright protects this publication the pattern can not be reproduced in any way without my written consent items made with this pattern can be sold if you share your items on social media we ask that you credit the designer and link to the original pattern thank you for understanding version control version 1 2 pattern tester information tanya hodges tanya used 1850 m of hobbii twister yarn she used a 3 5mm hook finished size was approximately 109cm mira dixon mira used an 1800 metre kokonki skein and a 3 5mm hook finished size was approximately 95 cm colleen o neill colleen used a 2000 metre kokonki skein with a 4mm hook finished size was approximately 115cm stitch information magic_ring chain single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet into the stitch indicated 5 double_crochet puff chain 2 5 double_crochet puff chain 2 5 double_crochet puff puff cluster fan 5dc into the same stitch bobbles or popcorn puff front post double_crochet back post double_crochet notes you can use either popcorn or puff throughout this pattern you can follow the pattern or use whichever stitch you prefer part 1 ­ humble beginnings part 2 ­ beautiful hydrangeas part 3 ­ marges handmade curtains part 4 classically vintage granny ­ the border ­ a life framed peak centre zoom for stitch placement 14 fin
